Title: Relates to requiring the periodic inspection and maintenance of heating and cooling systems for the purpose of preventing and detecting the presence of legionella bacteria
Summary: Relates to requiring the periodic inspection and maintenance of heating and cooling systems for the purpose of preventing and detecting the presence of legionella bacteria.
LawCode: Add Art 13 Title 13-A ยง1389-aaa, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring the periodic inspection and maintenance of heating and cooling systems for the purpose of preventing and detecting the presence of legionella bacteria
